Title: [Packing List]
Text:
Dried Wuthercake, Loong Buns, and the family cookbook.
-Enough packing dry foods, did you get my cookbook?
-Mom, I'll just learn the recipes from you when we get to Jinzhou. This cookbook is falling apart, I'd say we just leave it.
-What would you know! Wherever this cookbook goes, there will be the taste of home. What happens if I'm not around anymore sometime in the future...

A pack of energy drinks.
-Energy drinks are too heavy to carry. Can't we just bring a water bottle?
-What if there's no clean water source on the way? These canned drinks will be the only thing we can rely on!
-Well, if you say so. You carry it then.
-Oh, you better not drink a single can when the time comes!

Tents and outdoor equipment.
-We're not going on a camping trip, honey.
-But Dad told me we are going camping.
-Hmm... Not just any camping trip. Oh, don't forget to put on your fortune pendant from Grandma.
